titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding alcohol use by the Nation's youth.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1400)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committee.name: House Committee on District of Columbia

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health.

bill.summary: 5/27/1993--Introduced. Urges the States and the District of Columbia to enact comprehensive laws to prohibit any person under 21 years of age from purchasing or attempting to purchase alcohol, possessing or consuming it in public, and misrepresenting his or her age or using false identification to purchase alcohol.
